segments.text: I do ! My favorites are Mexican , Thai , and Indian .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Have you ever tried Moroccan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't say that I have . What are the basic ingredients ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . A friend of mine said I should try it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know where a Moroccan restaurant is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As a matter of fact , he gave me this address .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's go there for lunch ! I'm up for an adventure !
segments.speaker: S2
